sentences.en: A born magpie, Mandy collects any object that catches her eye.
sentences.cn: 曼迪天生喜欢收集小玩意，只要是她看上的都会收藏起来。

sentences.en: a small metal object
sentences.cn: 一个小金属物件

sentences.en: a tycoon for whom money is no object.
sentences.cn: 一个可以随意支配金钱的大亨。

sentences.en: Although he was based in Wales, distance was no object.
sentences.cn: 虽然他主要住在威尔士，但是距离不成问题。

sentences.en: an everyday object such as a spoon
sentences.cn: 调羹之类的日常用品

sentences.en: As a heavy child, she became the object of ridicule from classmates.
sentences.cn: 由于体胖，她成了班上同学嘲笑的对象。

sentences.en: He became the object of ridicule and scorn.
sentences.cn: 他成了嘲弄和鄙视的对象。

sentences.en: He made it his object in life to find the island.
sentences.cn: 他把找到那座岛屿当成自己的人生目标。

sentences.en: He thought of the baby almost as an inanimate object.
sentences.cn: 他认为婴儿几乎就是毫无生命的物体。

sentences.en: If no one objects, I would like Mrs Harrison to be present.
sentences.cn: 如果没人反对的话，我想请哈里森夫人出席。

sentences.en: Life has a value only when it has something valuable as its object.
sentences.cn: 目标有价值，生活才有价值。(黑格尔)

sentences.en: My object was to explain the decision simply.
sentences.cn: 我的目的是要简单明了地解释这一决定。

sentences.en: My object was to publish a scholarly work on Peter Mourne.
sentences.cn: 我的目标是出版一本关于彼得·莫恩的学术著作。

sentences.en: scientists studying plants, animals, or inanimate objects
sentences.cn: 研究植物、动物或无生命物体的科学家

sentences.en: She knew that she was an object of pity among her friends.
sentences.cn: 她知道自己是朋友们同情的对象。

sentences.en: The distant object of his affections is Caroline.
sentences.cn: 他一厢情愿地爱慕卡罗琳。

sentences.en: The object has no real value, materially or emotionally.
sentences.cn: 无论从物质还是情感上说，这个东西都一无是处。

sentences.en: The object of her hatred was 24-year-old model Ros French.
sentences.cn: 令她心头生恨的是24岁的模特罗斯·弗伦奇。

sentences.en: The object of the exercise is to raise money for the charity.
sentences.cn: 那样做旨在筹集善款。

sentences.en: The patient'simmune system would reject the transplanted organ as a foreign object.
sentences.cn: 病人的免疫系统会对移植器官产生异质排斥反应。

sentences.en: When a large object impacts the Earth, it makes a crater.
sentences.cn: 当巨大物体撞击地球时，就会产生凹坑。

words.tran_cn: 讨厌的；会引起反对的；有异议的
异议，反对；缺陷，缺点；妨碍；拒绝的理由
目的；目标；[光] 物镜；宾格
使具体化，使客观化；体现

phrases.tran_cn: 被控对象，受控对象；控制对象
n. 直接宾语；直接客体
不影响（或不妨碍）作选择（或决定）；不成问题
目标识别；对象的确认，对象标识；物体识别
面向对象的；对象趋向的；物件导向的
做某事（或采取某一行动）的目的

trans.tran_cn: 物体，目标，宾语，（情感或反应的）对象
trans.tran_en: a solid thing that you can hold, touch, or see but that is not alive

trans.tran_cn: 反对，反感，提出…作为反对的理由
trans.tran_en: to state a fact or opinion as a reason for opposing or disapproving of something
to feel or say that you oppose or disapprove of something
